description:
You wouldn’t go for a run in your everyday shoes, so why train in your everyday underwear. Teaming up with the underwear experts at BN3TH, MEC has brought the comfort and breathability of our midweight merino, together with BN3TH’s supportive MyPakage 3D pouch. These boxer briefs will keep you comfy, regardless of the forecast and regardless of your output.

  • Merino blend is responsible wool certified, naturally wicking, naturally breathable, and naturally odour resistant
  • MyPakage technology 3-dimensional pouch provides excellent support
  • Pucker panel ensures your sensitive areas stay comfortable
  • Premium waistband is sewn directly to the body for long-lasting durability
  • Low-profile flat-locked seams lay comfortably against your skin
  • 6.5 in. inseam
  • Trim athletic fit
name: MEC x BN3TH Merino Wool Boxer Brief - Men's
